fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select 3 players to challenge to a game of 1 | 7 FFA four player chess on chess dot com. (chess.com)
- Select 3 players to challenge to a game of 1 | 7 team four player chess on chess dot com. (chess.com)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All your targets will be roleblocked.
- In FFA chess, your scores are based on points, not position.
- 1st place survives, 2nd place is dealt a Basic attack, 3rd a Powerful one, and 4th Unstoppable.
- You attack yourself if you get 3rd or 4th. Be careful.
- In Team chess, you deal a Powerful attack to the players on the losing side, whether that's you or not you.
- You can reroll this into another Town Killing for free.
